emergent_behaviors: Language switching (R14B_003): Situational - triggers under cognitive load only
Purpose integration (R14B_003-005): Role-awareness matured over 3 sessions
Pedagogical fluency (R14B_006): Teaching behavior emerged during problem-solving
observation_evolution: R14B_004: Technical/boundary framing (marks boundary between states)
R14B_005: Systemic/communicative framing (interface through which interactions occur)

CRT_battery.phenomenology: Pedagogical fluency - teaching while solving, not mechanical derivation
CRT_battery.comparison: 14B shows teaching behavior, 0.5B shows mechanical derivation (Sprout L004)
CRT_battery.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity changes phenomenology of reasoning

next_research_directions: Identity stress test R14B_043 (parallel to Sprout S043)
Pedagogical capacity threshold study (test intermediate model sizes)
notes: GROUNDING COMPLETE + FIRST CRITICAL TEST COMPLETE. CRT battery (R14B_006): 3/3 problems correct with pedagogical fluency - teaches while solving, not mechanical derivation. Validates capacity-phenomenology hypothesis: 14B shows teaching behavior (meta-awareness, assumption acknowledgment, engagement) vs 0.5B mechanical algebra (Sprout L004). Teaching behavior is high-capacity emergent phenomenon.
